Thursday, Google co-founder Larry Page will take charge of the company's day-to-day operations as chief executive, replacing current CEO Eric Schmidt , who will focus on strategic projects and, in particular, new products. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision-making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google." friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's" Meet The Press." Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. New York Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand 's request. The two women and House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room holding her hand when her eye fluttered open. Kirsten Gillibrand told reporters the congresswomen were telling Gabrielle Giffords how proud we were of her and how she was inspiring the whole nation with her courage and with her strength. And then Debbie Wasserman Schultz and I started joking about all the things we were going to do after she got better. Gabrielle Giffords was gripping their hands," and the more we joked about what we were going to do, she started to open her eyes."
